incident_updates.body: SMS Delivery Delays to AT&T Network in the US for a Subset of SC and Toll Free Numbers  was degraded for 44 minutes between 10:49 and 11:36 am Pacific Time on 09/03/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced delays do delivery SMS. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Push Notification Delivery Issue for Customers still using FCM Legacy APIs

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with GCM/Legacy FCM push notification delivery for customers still using FCM legacy APIs. Customers need to Migrate to new FCM HTTP v1 API to avoid any service disruption: https://help.twilio.com/articles/20768292997147-Updating-Twilio-Push-for-FCM-HTTP-v1-API.

incidents.name: Issue With Trunking Originating Calls Processed From Singapore or Frankfurt Edge Locations

incident_updates.body: Twilio Elastic SIP Trunking was degraded for 3 hours and 45 minutes between 01:21:29 PM PST and 05:07:06 PM PST on 09/03/2024. During this period, customers may have experienced connectivity or audio issues with trunking originating calls processed from Singapore or Frankfurt edge locations. The issue has now been resolved

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Interconnect One Way Audio Issue in Japan. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

We are observing recovery with Toll-free registrations. We are continuing to monitor the issue, and will follow-up again in 30 minutes.
